explanations.unsupervised learning: The paper discusses clustering techniques (user and item clustering) which are a part of unsupervised learning.
explanations.clustering: The paper explicitly mentions clustering users and items as part of the Eigentaste 5.0 algorithm.
explanations.principal components analysis: The paper references Eigentaste 2.0 which uses principal component analysis to cluster users offline, indicating the use of PCA in the research.
